mapper.select: select /* AdminManage.getGroupInfoList - 그룹정보 리스트 조회 */ a.we_group_idx as weGroupIdx , a.we_group_name as weGroupName , case when a.we_group_type = '0' then '조직' when a.we_group_type = '1' then '그룹' end as weGroupType , a.we_group_owner as weGroupOwner , a.we_group_info as weGroupInfo , a.we_ins_date as weInsDate , b.we_user_nick as weUserNick from we_group_info a, we_user b where a.we_use_yn = 'Y' and a.we_group_owner = b.we_user_idx

select /* AdminManage.getGroupUserList - 그룹에 속한 사용자 리스트 조회 */ a.we_user_idx as weUserIdx , a.we_user_id as weUserId , a.we_user_nick as weUserNick , b.we_ins_date as weInsDate from we_user a, we_group_user b where b.we_use_yn = 'Y' and a.we_user_auth_yn = 'Y' and a.we_user_idx = b.we_user_idx and b.we_group_idx = #{weGroupIdx} order by a.we_user_idx

select /* AdminManage.getUserListMailInfo - 그룹에 속한 사용자 리스트 조회 */ a.we_user_idx as weUserIdx , a.we_user_name as weUserName , a.we_user_id as weUserId , a.we_user_nick as weUserNick , b.we_user_email as weUserEmail , a.we_user_join_date as weUserJoinDate , a.we_user_auth_yn as weUserAuthYn , a.we_user_auth_date as weUserAuthDate , b.we_grade as weGrade , b.we_point as wePoint , b.we_visit_date as weVisitDate , b.we_tech_yn as weTechYn , (select c.we_ins_date from we_send_mail c where c.we_user_idx = a.we_user_idx ) as weInsDate , (select case when d.we_send_status = '0' then '전송완료' when d.we_send_status = '1' then '전송실패' when d.we_send_status = '2' then '관리자재전송' when d.we_send_status = '3' then '관리자재전송실패' end from we_send_mail d where d.we_user_idx = a.we_user_idx ) as weSendStatus from we_user a, we_profile b where a.we_user_idx = b.we_user_idx and b.we_away_yn = 'N'
and a.we_user_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{we_user_id}, '%')
and a.we_user_nick LIKE CONCAT('%', #{we_user_nick}, '%')
and a.we_user_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{we_user_name}, '%')

select /* AdminManage.getUserListByGrade - 그룹에 속한 사용자 리스트 조회 */ a.we_user_idx as weUserIdx , a.we_user_name as weUserName , a.we_user_id as weUserId , a.we_user_nick as weUserNick , b.we_user_email as weUserEmail , a.we_user_join_date as weUserJoinDate , a.we_user_auth_yn as weUserAuthYn , a.we_user_auth_date as weUserAuthDate , b.we_grade as weGrade , b.we_point as wePoint , b.we_visit_date as weVisitDate , b.we_tech_yn as weTechYn , (select c.we_ins_date from we_send_mail c where c.we_user_idx = a.we_user_idx ) as weInsDate , (select case when d.we_send_status = '0' then '전송완료' when d.we_send_status = '1' then '전송실패' when d.we_send_status = '2' then '관리자재전송' when d.we_send_status = '3' then '관리자재전송실패' end from we_send_mail d where d.we_user_idx = a.we_user_idx ) as weSendStatus from we_user a, we_profile b where a.we_user_idx = b.we_user_idx and b.we_away_yn = #{we_away_yn} and b.we_grade = #{we_grade}

select /* AdminManage.getUserListByGroup - 그룹에 속한 사용자 리스트 조회 */ a.we_user_idx as weUserIdx , a.we_user_name as weUserName , a.we_user_id as weUserId , a.we_user_nick as weUserNick , b.we_user_email as weUserEmail , a.we_user_join_date as weUserJoinDate , a.we_user_auth_yn as weUserAuthYn , a.we_user_auth_date as weUserAuthDate , b.we_grade as weGrade , b.we_point as wePoint , b.we_visit_date as weVisitDate , b.we_tech_yn as weTechYn , (select c.we_ins_date from we_send_mail c where c.we_user_idx = a.we_user_idx ) as weInsDate , (select case when d.we_send_status = '0' then '전송완료' when d.we_send_status = '1' then '전송실패' when d.we_send_status = '2' then '관리자재전송' when d.we_send_status = '3' then '관리자재전송실패' end from we_send_mail d where d.we_user_idx = a.we_user_idx ) as weSendStatus from we_user a, we_profile b, we_group_user c where a.we_user_idx = b.we_user_idx and a.we_user_idx = c.we_user_idx and b.we_away_yn = 'N' and c.we_use_yn = 'Y' and c.we_group_idx = #{weGroupIdx}

SELECT a.we_user_idx , a.we_user_id , a.we_user_name , a.we_user_nick , DATE_FORMAT(a.we_user_join_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS we_user_join_date FROM we_user a, we_profile b WHERE a.we_user_idx = b.we_user_idx AND a.we_user_auth_yn = 'Y' AND b.we_away_yn = 'N' AND b.we_grade >= 3

select a.we_group_idx, a.we_group_name, a.we_group_type from we_group_info a, we_group_user b where a.we_group_idx = b.we_group_idx and a.we_use_yn = a.we_use_yn and b.we_use_yn = 'Y' and b.we_user_idx = #{weGroupIdx}

SELECT /* AdminManage.getSpaceListMonth - 최근 한달간 생성된 공간 목록 조회 */ a.we_space_idx, a.we_space_name, a.we_space_desc, a.we_view_privacy, a.we_edit_privacy, a.we_admin_idx, a.we_space_exposed, a.we_use_yn, a.we_ins_user, a.we_ins_date, a.we_upd_user, a.we_upd_date, b.we_user_nick as we_space_admin_nick FROM we_space a, we_user b WHERE a.we_use_yn = #{space.we_use_yn} AND a.we_admin_idx = we_user_idx
AND a.we_ins_date >= #{month}

SELECT /* AdminManage.getSpaceDetailInfo - 공간 상세 조회 */ a.we_space_idx, a.we_space_name, a.we_space_desc, a.we_view_privacy, a.we_edit_privacy, a.we_admin_idx, a.we_space_exposed, a.we_use_yn, a.we_ins_user, a.we_ins_date, a.we_upd_user, a.we_upd_date, b.we_user_nick as we_space_admin_nick FROM we_space a, we_user b WHERE a.we_use_yn = 'Y' AND a.we_admin_idx = we_user_idx AND a.we_space_idx = #{weSpaceIdx}

SELECT /* AdminManage.getWikiListInSpace - 공간에 속한 위키 리스트 조회 */ we_wiki_idx, we_space_idx, we_wiki_parent_idx, we_wiki_order_idx, we_wiki_depth_idx, we_wiki_title, we_wiki_text, we_wiki_markup, we_wiki_revision, we_wiki_status, we_wiki_quota, we_wiki_url, we_wiki_agree, we_wiki_view_cnt, we_wiki_prev, we_wiki_next, we_user_ip, we_edit_text, we_use_yn, we_ins_user, we_ins_date, we_upd_user, we_upd_date, we_edit_yn, (SELECT a.we_user_nick FROM we_user a WHERE a.we_user_idx = b.we_ins_user) AS we_user_nick, CASE WHEN b.we_wiki_protect = '0' THEN '기본' WHEN b.we_wiki_protect = '1' THEN '준보호' WHEN b.we_wiki_protect = '2' THEN '보호' WHEN b.we_wiki_protect = '3' THEN '신고' WHEN b.we_wiki_protect = '4' THEN '삭제예정' WHEN b.we_wiki_protect = '6' THEN '이의제기' WHEN b.we_wiki_protect = '7' THEN '토론' WHEN b.we_wiki_protect = '8' THEN '삭제복구' WHEN b.we_wiki_protect = '9' THEN '관리자삭제' END AS we_wiki_protect FROM we_wiki b WHERE we_space_idx = #{weSpaceIdx} AND we_use_yn = 'Y'

SELECT we_wiki_idx, we_space_idx, we_wiki_parent_idx, we_wiki_order_idx, we_wiki_depth_idx, we_wiki_title, we_wiki_text, we_wiki_markup, we_wiki_revision, we_wiki_status, we_wiki_quota, we_wiki_url, we_wiki_agree, we_wiki_view_cnt, we_wiki_prev, we_wiki_next, we_user_ip, we_edit_text, we_use_yn, we_ins_user, we_ins_date, we_upd_user, we_upd_date, we_edit_yn, (SELECT a.we_user_nick FROM we_user a WHERE a.we_user_idx = b.we_ins_user) AS we_user_nick, CASE WHEN b.we_wiki_protect = '0' THEN '기본' WHEN b.we_wiki_protect = '1' THEN '준보호' WHEN b.we_wiki_protect = '2' THEN '보호' WHEN b.we_wiki_protect = '3' THEN '신고' WHEN b.we_wiki_protect = '4' THEN '삭제예정' WHEN b.we_wiki_protect = '6' THEN '이의제기' WHEN b.we_wiki_protect = '7' THEN '토론' WHEN b.we_wiki_protect = '8' THEN '삭제복구' WHEN b.we_wiki_protect = '9' THEN '관리자삭제' END AS we_wiki_protect FROM we_wiki b WHERE 1 = 1
AND we_ins_user IN (SELECT we_user_idx FROM we_user c WHERE c.we_user_nick LIKE CONCAT('%', #{weUserNick}, '%'))
AND we_wiki_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{weWikiTitle}, '%')
AND we_wiki_text LIKE CONCAT('%', #{weWikiText}, '%')
AND we_space_idx IN (SELECT we_space_idx FROM we_space d WHERE d.we_space_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{weSpaceName}, '%'))
AND we_use_yn = 'Y'

SELECT /* AdminManage.getWikiDetailInfo - 위키 상세 내역 조회 */ we_wiki_idx, we_space_idx, we_wiki_parent_idx, we_wiki_order_idx, we_wiki_depth_idx, we_wiki_title, we_wiki_text, we_wiki_markup, we_wiki_revision, we_wiki_status, we_wiki_quota, we_wiki_url, we_wiki_agree, we_wiki_view_cnt, we_wiki_prev, we_wiki_next, we_user_ip, we_edit_text, we_use_yn, we_ins_user, we_ins_date, we_upd_user, we_upd_date, we_edit_yn, (SELECT a.we_user_nick FROM we_user a WHERE a.we_user_idx = b.we_ins_user) AS we_user_nick, CASE WHEN b.we_wiki_protect = '0' THEN '기본' WHEN b.we_wiki_protect = '1' THEN '준보호' WHEN b.we_wiki_protect = '2' THEN '보호' WHEN b.we_wiki_protect = '3' THEN '신고' WHEN b.we_wiki_protect = '4' THEN '삭제예정' WHEN b.we_wiki_protect = '6' THEN '이의제기' WHEN b.we_wiki_protect = '7' THEN '토론' WHEN b.we_wiki_protect = '8' THEN '삭제복구' WHEN b.we_wiki_protect = '9' THEN '관리자삭제' END AS we_wiki_protect FROM we_wiki b WHERE we_wiki_idx = #{weWikiIdx} AND we_use_yn = 'Y'

SELECT t.* FROM ( /* AdminManage.getKeywordList - 키워드 리스트 조회 */ SELECT b.we_wiki_tag_idx as weWikiTagIdx , a.we_wiki_title as weWikiTitle , b.we_wiki_idx as weWikiIdx , b.we_tag as weTag , b.we_wiki_revision as weWikiRevision , b.we_ins_date as weInsDate FROM we_wiki a, we_wiki_tag b WHERE a.we_wiki_idx = b.we_wiki_idx AND a.we_use_yn = 'Y' AND b.we_use_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY b.we_wiki_tag_idx DESC) t LIMIT #{startRow}, #{endRow}

select we_wiki_idx, we_space_idx, we_wiki_parent_idx, we_wiki_order_idx, we_wiki_depth_idx, we_wiki_title, we_wiki_text, we_wiki_markup, we_wiki_revision, we_wiki_status, we_wiki_quota, we_wiki_url, we_wiki_agree, we_wiki_view_cnt, we_wiki_prev, we_wiki_next, we_user_ip, we_edit_text, we_use_yn, we_ins_user, we_ins_date, we_upd_user, we_upd_date, we_edit_yn, (SELECT a.we_user_nick FROM we_user a WHERE a.we_user_idx = b.we_ins_user) AS we_user_nick, CASE WHEN b.we_wiki_protect = '0' THEN '기본' WHEN b.we_wiki_protect = '1' THEN '준보호' WHEN b.we_wiki_protect = '2' THEN '보호' WHEN b.we_wiki_protect = '3' THEN '신고' WHEN b.we_wiki_protect = '4' THEN '삭제예정' WHEN b.we_wiki_protect = '6' THEN '이의제기' WHEN b.we_wiki_protect = '7' THEN '토론' WHEN b.we_wiki_protect = '8' THEN '삭제복구' WHEN b.we_wiki_protect = '9' THEN '관리자삭제' END AS we_wiki_protect FROM we_wiki b where we_use_yn = 'Y' AND we_ins_date >= #{month}
mapper.update: INSERT INTO WE_GROUP_INFO ( we_group_code ,we_group_name ,we_group_type ,we_group_owner ,we_required_yn ,we_group_info ,we_use_yn ,we_ins_user ,we_ins_date ) VALUES ( #{we_group_code} ,#{we_group_name} ,'1' ,(SELECT * FROM (SELECT WE_USER_IDX FROM WE_USER WHERE WE_USER_ID = #{we_group_owner}) T1) ,'Y' ,#{we_group_info} ,'Y' ,1 ,NOW() )

INSERT INTO WE_GROUP_USER ( we_group_idx ,we_user_idx ,we_use_yn ,we_ins_user ,we_ins_date ) VALUES ( (SELECT * FROM (SELECT WE_GROUP_IDX FROM WE_GROUP_INFO WHERE WE_GROUP_CODE = #{we_group_idx}) T1) ,(SELECT * FROM (SELECT WE_USER_IDX FROM WE_USER WHERE WE_USER_ID = #{we_user_idx}) T2) ,'Y' ,1 ,NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT WE_FUNCTION_IDX, /* AdminManage.getCurrentFunctionList - 기능 리스트 조회 */ WE_FUNCTION_NAME, WE_FUNCTION_DESC, WE_FUNCTION_CODE, WE_FUNCTION_VER, WE_FUNCTION_TYPE, WE_USE_YN, WE_EXTEND_YN, WE_INS_DATE, WE_INS_USER, WE_CALL_URL FROM we_function WHERE WE_USE_YN = 'Y' AND WE_EXTEND_YN = #{we_extend_yn} AND WE_FUNCTION_IDX > (SELECT WE_FUNCTION_IDX FROM we_function WHERE we_function_ver = #{version})
SELECT WE_PATCH_IDX, WE_FUNCTION_IDX, WE_FILE_NAME, WE_FILE_PATH, WE_PATCH_TYPE, WE_PATCH_PATH, WE_INS_DATE FROM we_patch WHERE WE_FUNCTION_IDX = #{we_function_idx}

select /* AdminManage.getUserListMailInfo - 그룹에 속한 사용자 리스트 조회 */ a.we_user_idx as weUserIdx , a.we_user_name as weUserName , a.we_user_id as weUserId , a.we_user_nick as weUserNick , b.we_user_email as weUserEmail , a.we_user_join_date as weUserJoinDate , a.we_user_auth_yn as weUserAuthYn , a.we_user_auth_date as weUserAuthDate , b.we_grade as weGrade , b.we_point as wePoint , b.we_visit_date as weVisitDate , b.we_tech_yn as weTechYn , (select c.we_ins_date from we_send_mail c where c.we_user_idx = a.we_user_idx ) as weInsDate , (select case when d.we_send_status = '0' then '전송완료' when d.we_send_status = '1' then '전송실패' when d.we_send_status = '2' then '관리자재전송' when d.we_send_status = '3' then '관리자재전송실패' end from we_send_mail d where d.we_user_idx = a.we_user_idx ) as weSendStatus from we_user a, we_profile b where a.we_user_idx = b.we_user_idx and b.we_away_yn = 'Y'

SELECT we_bbs_idx , we_space_idx , we_user_ip , we_bbs_title , we_bbs_text , we_ins_date , we_ins_name , we_hit_count FROM we_bbs WHERE 1 = 1 AND we_use_yn='Y'
AND we_space_idx = #{we_space_idx}
AND we_ins_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{we_ins_name}, '%')
AND we_bbs_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{we_bbs_title}, '%')
AND we_bbs_text LIKE CONCAT('%', #{we_bbs_text}, '%')
ORDER BY we_bbs_idx DESC
